01.speaker: Ògún
01.text: Ta ni o ń wá mi níbi yìí? Kí ló mú ẹ wá sí ilẹ̀ irin?
01.translation: Who seeks me here? What brings you to the land of iron?
01.scene_description: Ògún stands amidst roaring flames, hammering a glowing blade upon his anvil. Sparks fly with each strike, and the air smells of molten metal.

options.text: Ọbàtálá rán mi. A nilo iranlọwọ rẹ!
options.translation: Ọbàtálá sent me. We need your help!

options.text: Mo wá láti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìmọ̀ yín, Ògún Olùdá Irin.
options.translation: I have come to learn your wisdom, Ògún, Creator of Iron.

01.life_spirit_hint: Ògún respects courage and purpose. Be direct and fearless.

02.speaker: Ògún
02.text: Ìjọba òkùnkùn ń dẹ́ wa dúró. Ṣugbọn kì í ṣe nípa agbara nìkan ni a fi ń ṣẹ́gun. Ṣé o setan láti fi ọpọlọ loògùn?
02.translation: The dark forces block our path. But victory is not through strength alone. Are you ready to use wisdom as your weapon?
02.scene_description: Ògún halts his hammering and looks at Ọmọtẹmi with piercing eyes, as if weighing her soul.

options.text: Mo ṣetan lati kọ ẹkọ rẹ.
options.translation: I am ready to learn your ways.

options.text: Mo fẹ gbìyànjú agbara mí ni akọkọ.
options.translation: I want to test my strength first.

02.life_spirit_hint: Strength without wisdom is reckless. Choose wisely.

03.speaker: Ògún
03.text: Ó dára. Ìṣòro kan wà. Ìtàn ti sọnu. Ìwọ gbọdọ wá òwe atijọ́ tó fi ìmọ̀ yìí pamọ́.
03.translation: Good. But there is a problem. The knowledge has been lost. You must uncover the ancient proverbs that hold this wisdom.
03.scene_description: Ògún gestures towards a stone tablet covered in cryptic Yoruba inscriptions, glowing faintly.

options.text: Nibo ni mo ti le rí àwọn òwe yìí?
options.translation: Where can I find these proverbs?

03.life_spirit_hint: The wisdom of the past is the key to the future.

04.speaker: Ògún
04.text: Agbara rẹ yóò ní idanwo. Ṣùgbọ́n ìmọ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀wọ́kànsí. Nígbà tó bá gbọ́ àdánù yóò jẹ?
04.translation: Your strength will be tested. But knowledge is key. When brute force fails, what will you do?
04.scene_description: Ògún slams his hammer down, causing the ground to tremble as a trial begins.

options.text: Mo máa lo ìmọ̀ àti agbára papọ̀.
options.translation: I will use both knowledge and strength together.

options.text: Mo máa gbẹ̀kẹ̀lé agbára mi nìkan.
options.translation: I will rely on my strength alone.

04.life_spirit_hint: A warrior without wisdom is like an iron blade without an edge.

05.speaker: Ògún
05.text: Lo sí ibi ìsìn àtijọ́, ibi tí àwọn òrìṣà ti fi ìmọ̀ pamọ́. Ṣùgbọ́n ṣọ́ra, àwọn jàǹdùkú ń wá ìpa rẹ.
05.translation: Go to the ancient shrine, where the Orisha hid their knowledge. But be careful, bandits seek its power too.
05.scene_description: Ògún nods, handing Ọmọtẹmi a map to the shrine hidden deep in the forest.

options.text: Mo máa lọ sí ibẹ̀ ní kíákíá!

05.life_spirit_hint: Knowledge is hidden in the most sacred of places. Be swift, but be wise.
